page.title: 07Employment in New Mills
page.content: Factory employment is one of the biggest groups of employment in New Mills. The factories in New Mills are Garrison Works which is made up of 5 factories. Another factory is Swizzels which makes sweets. The Canal Foundry is another factory. Farming in Newtown is mostly enclosed rough grazing. There are about 37 farms in New Mills. If you walk along the Sett Valley Trail you will see some of the grazing fields. There is quite a large shopping centre in New Mills. There are two main supermarkets and two markets. At the top of New Mills an estate has been built. That is where most of the commuters live. The more commuters that come to New Mills, the more estates that need to be built.
